segments.text: The weather is so crazy . It rained cats and dogs last night , but cleared up in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was worried about canceling the climbing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , wait for me . I am too tired to move a step further .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about taking the cable car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Attaboy , that's just what I am thinking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , What a long queue this is !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , be patient . It's better to wait than to climb with my legs broken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Daddy , look ahead in the distance , the mountains there . They roll all the way up to the sky .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , the scenery is beautiful . What's more , the air is fresh here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not , I have to watch my American Idol .
segments.speaker: S2
